name: officedev-microsoft-teams-samples-tab-nested-auth-nodejs
title: This sample shows nested app authentication.
shortDescription: This sample showcases nested app authentication (NAA), a protocol that simplifies single sign-on (SSO) for single-page applications in environments like Microsoft Teams and Outlook.
longDescription: This Microsoft Teams sample demonstrates nested app authentication (NAA), a new protocol designed to streamline single sign-on (SSO) for single-page applications. By facilitating smoother authentication across nested applications, it offers advantages over traditional On-Behalf-Of (OBO) flows within the Microsoft 365 ecosystem.

thumbnails.alt: Solution UX showing gif nested app authentication.

references.name: Teams development videos from the community
